Favorites
01/12/2019

Home Tour Links

I haven’t done a house tour for a hot minute but after reading a bazillion texts asking for one, I broke down and did one the other day on my Instagram stories.

A couple of things:

  1. You’re seeing my house on one of the rare occasions that it’s actually clean. DO NOT think this is normal every day life at the Thueson household.
  2. I probably spent more time designing my dream pantry than I did picking out my own kid’s names. No biggie. You can check out an in-depth rundown of that mother’s paradise HERE.
  3. I’ve linked everything I could think of in the list below. Keep in mind, I have had some of these pieces for a few years now so they may not be available or are available in limited quantities.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Think I missed something? Leave me a comment below telling me what you’re looking for!

 

 

MUD ROOM + HALF BATHROOM
1.
Drinking Fountain + Water Bottle Filler
Elkay
I was worried about having a drinking fountain in my home because I thought it might be an eyesore, but it ended up being one of the things we love the most! We save so much on bottled water, and instead of my kids grabbing 100 cups/day for water, they just get a drink from the drinking fountain.
Shop Now
2.
Key Hooks
Target
I love having a place for everything! Having key hooks right inside our garage door help us to never lose our keys.
Shop Now
3.
Toilet w/ Heated Seat + Bidet
Toto
You your toilet is awesome when people say they've been waiting to use to bathroom until they get to your house. The heated seat and warm water bidet are everything!
Shop Now
4.
Bidet Toilet Seat
Toto
If you're not ready to invest in the full automated toilet, this toilet seat installs right on your existing toilet!
Shop Now
KITCHEN & PANTRY
1.
Can Organizer
Fifo
Is there anything worse than having cans piled all over your pantry shelves, having to shuffle through them every time you need something, and finding cans 5 years later that were shoved in the back that have expired? This solves every single one of those problems! It saves so much space and rotates your cans so you're not only reaching for what you just purchased.
Shop Now
2.
Cordless Handheld Vacuum
Dyson
Vacuuming is my absolute favorite chore with this thing! It's so dang fun and easy to use. I used to dread vacuuming the stairs, but not since I got these!
Shop Now
3.
Stainless Steel Sink Grid
Elkay
This sink grid sits at the base of your sink and catches all the big things that you don't want making their way down your sink, and keep your sink so much cleaner!
Shop Now
4.
Barstools
Wrought Studio
I love this midcentury modern pop of gold for a kitchen, and they're super kid friendly.
Shop Now
5.
Kitchen Table
Restoration Hardware
I love how simple, warm, and modern this kitchen table is. It's also been super kid friendly!
Shop Now
6.
Drawer Organizer
Whitmor
I have these in almost every drawer in my house. I love that they are clear so I can see everything in the drawer at the same time.
Shop Now
7.
Kitchen Runner
NuLoom
Of all the links you guys requested, this was one of the top requests! It gives such a fun pop of color!
Shop Now
MY OFFICE
1.
Letter Board Organizer
Amazon
Have you ever wondered how to organize all of the tiny little letters that go to your letter board? This is an awesome solution to having to search for each letter in a jumbled mess.. just designate a square for 1-2 letters!
Shop Now
LIVING ROOM
1.
Entryway Planter Boxes
All Modern
Don't let the rusted photo of these on the website scare you off... They come as this industrial metal, but you can put them outside and let them weather. I love the natural metal, so I kept them as they came!
Shop Now
2.
Entryway Mirror
West Elm
I looked for so long to find a big round mirror for our entry way, and fell in love with this one! It's also a great price for the size of it!
Shop Now
3.
Homework Desk Chair
Houzz
We keep this chair at the built in desk between the kitchen and living room. Such a great neutral, kid friendly chair!
Shop Now
4.
Living Room Sectional
West Elm
This isn't my exact couch, but very similar! Simple, modern, cozy, and comes in tons of different colors! Get a darker fabric for a something a little more kid friendly.
Shop Now
5.
Living Room Area Rug
NuLoom
I worried at first when we chose this off-white rug for our living room, but it cleans up SO well! Also, you'll be so surprised when you see how inexpensive this area rug is!
Shop Now
6.
Living Room Ottoman
Article
Forest green is my favorite way to add a pop of color, but still staying neutral! We use this to rest our feet on, and it's comfy enough to use as extra seating when we have guests.
Shop Now
BRAUN'S OFFICE
1.
Leather Power Recliner
West Elm
I can't think of something more fitting for Braun's office that the most perfect chairs for napping! #braunsleeps But really, we get so much use out of these! Power naps, cuddling up on a cold day to watch movies, quick meetings, they're perfect and so comfy!
Shop Now
2.
Office Area Rug
West Elm
This might be my favorite rug on the market right now. It's the perfect amount of texture, color, and pattern while still staying neutral.
Shop Now
3.
Storage Ottoman
World Market
Every house needs a place to keep throw blankets that's close to where you hang out.. this ottoman is big enough to hold a whole bunch!
Shop Now
MASTER BEDROOM, BATHROOM, & CLOSET
1.
Master Bed
Restoration Hardware
The most perfect bed for sitting up and reading a book!
Shop Now
2.
Mid Century Chairs
West Elm
Again with the little bits of Green! It's my favorite, and the gold hairpin legs are such an elegant touch!
Shop Now
3.
Bedroom Area Rug
West Elm
I really wanted something cozy in our room, and this rug is so soft!
Shop Now
4.
Media Console
West Elm
I'm in love with the monochromatic details on this media console. I also love that it comes in multiple lengths!
Shop Now
5.
Planter and Stand
West Elm
These plant stands are the perfect accessory for any area.
Shop Now
6.
Shampoo, Conditioner, and Body Wash Dispenser
Simple Human
Say goodbye to your cluttered shower shelves. These suction to your shower wall and keep things looking so clean! I also love being able to see when we're getting low on things.
Shop Now
7.
Vanity Organizer
Container Store
Any time these make an appearance on my story I get questions about them! I have two just below my vanity mirror, and they hold all my most used makeup.
Shop Now
8.
Clear Containers
Container Store
I wish I knew about these containers before I bought hundreds of the Sterilite ones.. They stack so nicely, have a little more space, and the clear lid makes it much easier to see what's inside. You can even buy them in bulk to save money!
Shop Now
